scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && tsc --project tsconfig.json --outDir dist && mkdir -p dist/x_ig_scripts && if [ -f src/x_ig_scripts/inst_cookies.json ]; then cp src/x_ig_scripts/inst_cookies.json dist/x_ig_scripts/inst_cookies.json; fi && if [ -f src/x_ig_scripts/x_cookies.json ]; then cp src/x_ig_scripts/x_cookies.json dist/x_ig_scripts/x_cookies.json; fi
